author: Twentysix
TrustyJAID
description: Have your bot respond with cleverbot responses.
install_msg:
Needs to be setup with an API key first. See `[p]cleverbotset apikey` / `[p]cleverbotset ioapikey`
[p]cleverbot <text>` to talk with cleverbot.
`@Mention <text>` works too.
`[p]cleverbotset toggle` toggles replies by mention.
name: Cleverbot
